attributes.additional_details: After 37 years, 15 studio albums totalling over 85,000,000 units sold, 41 singles, 20 European and World tours, 1 Brit award, 1 Grammy award, an Ivor Novello, a Nordoff-Robbins Award and multiple Rock and metal media awards as well as being Globally known as massive influences to just about every band since and constantly flying the flag for Great Britain, I would like Iron Maiden band members Steve Harris, Bruce Dickinson, Dave Murray, Adrian Smith, Nicko McBrain and Janick Gers to be added to The Queens New Years Honours List. They have been ambassadors for Great Britain for decades and are ignored heroes for so many.
